android.support.v7.internal.widget
Interface ActivityChooserModel.ActivitySorter

Enclosing class:
ActivityChooserModel
public static interface ActivityChooserModel.ActivitySorter

Defines a sorter that is responsible for sorting the activities based on the provided historical choices and an intent.

Method Summary
 void sort(Intent intent, java.util.List<ActivityChooserModel.ActivityResolveInfo> activities, java.util.List<ActivityChooserModel.HistoricalRecord> historicalRecords)
          Sorts the activities in descending order of relevance based on previous history and an intent.
 

Method Detail

sort

void sort(Intent intent,
          java.util.List<ActivityChooserModel.ActivityResolveInfo> activities,
          java.util.List<ActivityChooserModel.HistoricalRecord> historicalRecords)
Sorts the activities in descending order of relevance based on previous history and an intent.

Parameters:
intent - The Intent.
activities - Activities to be sorted.
historicalRecords - Historical records.
